content: Hello! Welcome to your antenatal visit. May I have your full name, including both your first and last name?
Thank you, Gita. For our records, could you please provide your full name, including both your first and last name? If you have any initials, you can include them as well.
Thank you, Gita Prasad. Could you please share your full address, including your house number, street, area, and city?

Thank you for that information. Could you please provide the complete address, including your house number or plot number (if available), street name, area, city, and PIN code? This helps us keep accurate records.
Flat 302, Sri Venkateshwara Nilaya, near Hanuman Temple, Indiranagar.
Thank you for providing more details. Could you also please tell me the city and PIN code for your address? This will help ensure we have the complete information.
Thank you for sharing your address details. Could you please provide your 10-digit telephone number? This will help us contact you if needed.

I understand you are saying your number as words. To ensure we have the complete 10-digit telephone number, could you please provide the remaining digits? So far, you have mentioned "nine eight triple three forty seven." Please continue with the rest of the number.
Sorry.  It’s nine eight triple three forty-seven twenty-nine zero.
